original_text: The old agreement was powerful, but it came to an end. God's new agreement will continue always. So it surely shows the power of God even more!
korean_text: 없어질 것도 영광으로 말미암았은즉 길이 있을 것은 더욱 영광 가운데 있느니라

sentences.original_text: but it came to an end
God's new agreement will continue always
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 새 언약은 영원히 계속될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: So it surely shows the power of God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그것은 분명히 하나님의 능력을 보여줍니다
